ForienQuestLog.SampleTask: e.g. Kill all rats in „The Twisted Ankle” inn
ForienQuestLog.QuestForm.Title: Add new Quest
ForienQuestLog.QuestForm.QuestGiverPlace: Enter Actor's name or entity's UUID to set a Quest Source
ForienQuestLog.QuestForm.QuestGiverNameP: You selected custom image, please provide name for Quest Source
ForienQuestLog.QuestForm.DragDropActor: Drag & Drop Actor, Item or Journal Entry here to set a Quest Source
ForienQuestLog.QuestLog.Title: Quest Log
ForienQuestLog.QuestLog.SubTitle: Subquest of {0}
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.Title: Quest Details
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.SubTitle: Subquest of {0}
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.DragDropRewa: Drag & drop items here to add them as rewards
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.InvalidQuest: Cannot open Quest Preview due to invalid Quest ID.
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.Management.I: This Quest will only be visible to the selected players. Unchecking this option will remove all permissions and set the quest as inactive.
ForienQuestLog.QuestPreview.Management.C: Allow Players to edit Quest Details
ForienQuestLog.DeleteDialog.Title: Delete {name}
ForienQuestLog.DeleteDialog.Body: This quest and its data will be permanently deleted.
ForienQuestLog.CloseDialog.Title: Leave Form
ForienQuestLog.CloseDialog.Body: Are you sure you want to close the form? Unsaved data will be lost.
ForienQuestLog.Notifications.CannotOpen: Cannot open Quest Details. You may lack permissions, Quest might not exist anymore, or provided ID was invalid.
ForienQuestLog.Notifications.UserCantOpe: User {user} doesn't have permission to open this quest.
ForienQuestLog.Notifications.LinkCopied: Entity Link for this quest has been copied to clipboard.
ForienQuestLog.Notifications.QuestMoved: Moved quest to new folder and gave it new status: {target}.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.allowPlayersDrag: Allow Players to drag Rewards to their Inventory
Check to allow Players to drag Rewards from a Quest Details window to their owned Actors.
Check to show the "Available" tab in the Quest Log Menu where players can see all non-inactive Quests before they are accepted.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.countHidden.Enab: If checked, the number of completed/total tasks will include hidden tasks.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.navStyle.EnableH: Decide how Quest Log's navigation should be displayed.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.showFolder.Enabl: Check to show quest data folder in Journal tab. For DEBUG purposes only.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.showTasks.Enable: Decide if or how to show the amount of Objectives next to the Quest Title in Quest Log. This has no effect on the Quest Preview.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.titleAlign.Enabl: Decide how to position Quest Titles in the Quest Log Table.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.playersWelcomeSc: Uncheck to prevent players from seeing Welcome Screen on log in after an update. They might still see it by clicking 'help' icon in Quest Log.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.allowPlayersAcce: Check to allow players to accept Quests from Available tab.
ForienQuestLog.Settings.allowPlayersCrea: Check to allow players to create Quests. Player created Quests will appear in Available tab with Player Edit permissions. REQUIRES 'create journal' core permission.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.PersonalQuestBut: This is a Personal Quest, but no Players are assigned
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.PersonalQuestVis: This is a Personal Quest for
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.RewardHidden: Reward is hidden. Click to show.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.RewardVisible: Reward is visible. Click to hide.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.TaskHidden: Objective is hidden. Click to show.
ForienQuestLog.Tooltips.TaskVisible: Objective is visible. Click to hide.
ForienQuestLog.Api.__COMMENT__: No need for translating lines starting with 'API ERROR', they show in console for developers only.
ForienQuestLog.Api.create.title: API Error: Title property is required to create new Quest
ForienQuestLog.Api.hooks.createOpenQuest: API Error: Can't create macro with invalid Quest ID
ForienQuestLog.Api.reward.create.data: API Error: Data property with at least {name, img} is required to create new Reward
ForienQuestLog.Api.reward.create.type: API Error: Type property is required to create new Reward
ForienQuestLog.Api.task.create.name: API Error: Name property is required to create new Objective
ForienQuestLog.WorkshopPUF.Settings.enab: Check this to enable Quest Tracker HUD window.
ForienQuestLog.WorkshopPUF.Settings.ques: Check this to enable background for Quest Tracker, which might help with visibility on certain maps.
ForienQuestLog.WorkshopPUF.Settings.rese: Check this to reset position of Quest Tracker to default. Use this if you moved Quest Tracker into position where you cannot move it anymore.
